Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 61st/Midway Plaisance

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Dorchester, 63rd, Stony Island and 59th: due to,street blockage near 61st/Midway Plaisance

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #169 69th/UPS Express Temporary Reroute at 69th/Lowe
ShortDescription: 169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Wentworth, Marquette and Halsted due to street blockage near 69th/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Wentworth, Marquette and Halsted , due to street blockage near 69th/Harper.
